english.segment1: If this conversations going nowhere. Just give it more time to break through. Amazingly you bring to me new life
english.segment2: Right now. I know. That it never would have hurt to be here. Right now I invest in you and me. And it never would have hurt to be here
english.segment3: When the confusion comes from nowhere. I know it's not you. I'll break through. Amazingly you promise me new life
english.segment4: I'll break down , Eventually, and run into you
